channel.title: How do i set up a 317 server?
channel.description:
Sorry for the noobish question if you would call it that. I checked a couple of sub-forums and found nothing on how to get them up and running, however i found a download to one with no executable file or batch file or anything else my computer would read.
Any help is appreciated.

item.title: How do i set up a 317 server?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

It seems that you don’t even have a server set up.

I suggest following this tutorial: How to make a server by stormcutter

[quote=“mr bob silab2, post:5, topic:241210”]Well, there is a shit ton of tutorials if you would look. It involves downloading a source. Port forwardind and if you want to edit the source, JDK. If you need it more detailed, get off of your lazy ass.[/quote]You do realize you didn’t help at all, whatsoever.
